name: In Tents
description:
Keys for your character to move:

a to move left

d to move right

s to act like your ice skating

w to open doors and climb vines

Other functions

1 to activate full screen

2 to disable full screen

q to place a tent (You may only place 1 tent)

k to use sword on right side

u to use sword on left side

j to shoot bullet left (if you have any)

l to shoot bullet right (If you have any)

i to use inventory (to check armor level, bullet count, bread/cake count...

h to use any bread or cake that you have stored

press the left mouse button down over the quit button or the buy button from the shop or the go back to shop button, go back to other level buttons ...

That's about it! Hope you enjoy it!

(Note: There is no saving the game at the moment so ... good luck!)

Party Gopher Games

Note that on the second level there is a stick at the end where you have to chop it down with your sword. That could be very confusing...

Fight monsters, get better armor, swords, and bullets, fight bosses, destroy demons, help your queen, get even better swords, and get coins to buy a rake or a bow staff. Collect bread from a bread man, get cake, and even fight super eyes. This game was made just for fun.

Also, the levels get better as the game progresses.

Also if you want to see more interesting games go to https://party-gopher-games.wixsite.com/party-gopher-games
